attributes.action: Appoint a Pro-Police, Competent Home Secretary
attributes.additional_details: Tom Winson's nonsensical almost vindictive reviews on the Police, who are unable to take any industrial action in their own defence, are shameful. Police morale has been driven to an all time low. Teresa May's appointment of him reinforces her poor performance as Home Secretary and she should go. We ask that Teresa May be removed as Home Secretary and a competent person be given the post.
